data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Derby County with the kick-off.
At Vitality Stadium, Jason Knight has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 13, Philip Billing (Bournemouth) has received a yellow card from Robert Jones.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Graeme Shinnie.
Diego Rico Salguero for Bournemouth has been booked by Robert Jones and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Vitality Stadium.
Robert Jones blows to start the second-half. Bournemouth with the kick-off.
Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a first substitution, with Joshua King replacing Junior Stanislas.
In the minute 61, Phillip Cocu is making the team's first substitution at Vitality Stadium with Duane Holmes replacing Wayne Rooney.
The home team replace Jack Stacey with David Brooks.
Rodrigo Riquelme is replacing Philip Billing for the home team.
In the minute 81, Rodrigo Riquelme grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Vitality Stadium.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team have replaced Martyn Waghorn with Louie Sibley. This is the second substitution made today by Phillip Cocu.
